postfix/relayhost.description: Sets the relayhost value in main.cf

postfix/mail_type.description: Is this node a client or server/master?

recipes.rs-postfix::default: Default recipe in wrapper cookbook of postfix. Logic is done here based on inputs to determine which recipe in postfix cookbook to run.
